successes.title: Pier Solar HD an RPG for XBOX360, PC, Mac, Linux & Dreamcast
successes.description: Pier Solar is the biggest 16-bit RPG ever and it's coming to you in high definition for Xbox 360, PC, Mac, Linux & Sega Dreamcast!

Pledges.description: Pledge your support to become a backer and we will send you a Pier Solar sticker, plus you will have access to donor only updates that offer behind the scenes development of Pier Solar HD!
Pier Solar HD for XBOX 360. A Digital copy.
Pier Solar HD for PC, Mac or Linux. A Digital Downloadable copy of the game - DRM free.
Pier Solar Original Soundtrack. A 4 CD soundtrack that includes a cute little poster. These are the last remaining units that will ever be available!
The Digital Bundle. This bundle includes the XBOX 360 digital version, the PC/MAC/LINUX version and the full 4 CD Pier Solar OST in MP3 form!

Pier Solar Regular Edition for SEGA Dreamcast. You get to choose whichever region/packaging you want: either USA, Europe or Japanese packaging. We will send you a survey to select which region you want later.
Pier Solar Regular Edition for PC, Mac and Linux. The physical regular edition.

The Physical Bundle. This bundle includes EITHER the regular physical edition of Pier Solar for Sega Dreamcast OR the regular physical edition of Pier Solar for PC/MAC/LINUX and the physical 4 CD Pier Solar OST! We will send you a survey to select which Dreamcast region you want later.

Pier Solar HD Collectors Edition for PC, Mac & Linux. A beautiful, limited edition, physical package that includes Pier Solar HD compatible with PC, Mac & Linux, the Pier Solar Guide Book, a signed lithography, and three beautiful figurines. Kickstarter exclusive, limited to 250 produced, ever!

Pier Solar Collectors Edition for SEGA Dreamcast. A beautiful, limited edition, physical package that includes Pier Solar for SEGA Dreamcast (You get to choose whichever version you want: either USA, Europe or Japanese versions), the Pier Solar Guide Book, a signed lithography, and three beautiful figurines.  Kickstarter exclusive, limited to 750 produced, ever! We will send you a survey to select which region you want later.
Limited edition Poster
Any Collector’s Edition of your choice. +++PLUS+++ An exclusive, kickstarter limited edition poster made in super high quality material. Limited and numbered to 150 total. 30in x 22in (55cm x 76 cm).
I am the boss

You get a Collector’s Edition of your choice. +++PLUS+++ The limited edition Poster. +++PLUS+++ We will design you as the big boss in Pier Solar based off a picture that you submit! All the games we make (physical and digital) will feature you as an unlockable boss and you will receive an exclusive code that is used in game to activate this feature, so that you can challenge your friends to beat you! Also includes a custom cover with you as the big boss on it as well as the original signed sketch! This feature will be compatible with all versions of the game. A Kickstarter exclusive, limited to 10!
Pier Solar Classic Edition for SEGA Mega Drive and SEGA Genesis

You get a collectors edition of Pier Solar HD of your choice.  +++PLUS+++ The limited edition Poster.  +++PLUS+++ The choice of whichever Pier Solar Classic version you want: USA, Europe, or Japanese packaging and we will sign it for you! We will send you a survey to select which region(s) you want later.
One of a kind collectors pieces

You get a Collector's Edition of your choice. +++PLUS+++ The limited edition Poster. +++PLUS+++ A 100x100mm laser-cut of the original printing plates, annotated, numbered and signed. Includes a certificate of Authenticity. Protected in custom artboard casing. A Kickstarter exclusive, limited to 25!
A Pier Solar SEGA Dreamcast System. A SEGA Dreamcast system custom branded with Pier Solar artwork. It will include the custom system, controller and VMU. A Kickstarter exclusive, limited to 5!
A Pier Solar Xbox 360 System
